english.segment1: We seek the Son of God. We seek the Risen Lord. We seek the King of kings. The Savior of the world
english.segment2: We give our lives to You. We choose to follow You. We believe in You. We worship You
english.segment3: We seek Your face and. Humble ourselves here. The fire of God. Consuming the hearts of man
english.segment4: Nations will bow to You. Kingdoms will shake before. You. We pray for revival. We pray for revival
